description: How to fix shower floor joists…I sistered a new 2x6 using 3-inch construction screws. The screws are rated for this type of repair and staggered every 8 inches. Then I used 3/4 inch (23/32) tongue and groove plywood. This full tutorial is available inside our Video Library for Gold and Platinum members at homerepairtutor.com 🔥#carpentry #bathroomremodel #showerremodel #homerenovation
title: How to Fix Shower Floor Joists - #shorts #homerepairtutor
